articles.title: Sherlock Holmes History Proves Enola Holmes Lawsuit is Nonsense - Den of Geek UK
articles.description: The estate who holds a few scraps of the legal copyright to Sherlock Holmes is suing Netflix over a new adaptation called Enola Holmes. Sadly, this aggressive litigious behavior is nothing new.
